page.title: 16AMENITIES (cont.)
page.content: {PLAY GROUP }- The pre-school children from the village attend a play group in the hall each Wednesday morning. {CARPET BOWLS}- The carpet bowls club meet each Wednesday evening throughout the winter months to enjoy a game of bowls. {FACTS ABOUT STAR {______________-- {STAR MOSS }- The name{STAR}means a piece of boggy or wet land and even today the {MOSS,}which lies to the North West of the village, is boggy and wet. It is a peat bog with a right-of-way to{Kirkforthar Feus} which passes through the centre. Folklore has it that the Kings of Scotland, when in residence at { {Falkland Palace,}used the path as their direct route to the coast.
